name: Sample Product Requirements Prompt
description: A sample PRP demonstrating the structure and content expected
content:
# Product Requirements Prompt: E-commerce Platform

## Project Overview
Build a modern e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment processing.

## Core Features
- User registration and authentication
- Product browsing and search
- Shopping cart functionality
- Secure payment processing
- Order management
- Admin dashboard

## Technical Requirements
- Responsive web design
- Mobile-first approach
- RESTful API architecture
- Database optimization
- Security best practices

## Success Criteria
- Support 10,000+ concurrent users
- Page load times under 2 seconds
- 99.9% uptime
- PCI DSS compliance for payments
